biotools.summary: MyPROSLE was developed with the aim of bringing molecular information from patients to clinical practice. For this, we have created a new methodology to summarize the transcriptome of individual patients in a series of biological functions or gene-modules, which were later used to predict up to a total of 111 different clinical outcomes, including clinical manifestations, laboratory measurements, cytokine levels, autoantibodies, cell percentages, nearby disease flares and response to drugs.
